indexH1: I‚Äôm a Product Designer & Front-End Developer based in Barcelona.
indexSubhead: I prototype, design and develop digital products using the latest front-end techniques and design patterns.
indexServices1Copy: From early discovery to product evaluation, I use a wide variety of methods to evaluate, gather requirements and ideate solutions.
indexServices2Copy: I design detail oriented, pixel perfect, visual interfaces by combining clarity and visual hierarchy with typography and color.
indexServices3Copy: From paper sketches to high fidelity ‚ÄîI design and build prototypes to test and evaluate user interfaces.
indexServices4Copy: I develop React.js or Gatsby.js products using latest front-end techniques and tools. I believe that all products should be built with a strong focus on accesibility, performance and user interaction.
